attributes.action: Stop Taxi Drivers Talking on Phone While Driving.
attributes.background:
This is not a safe practice,  we are constantly told about the dangers of talking on phone while driving, yet 95% of taxi drivers will spend the duration of the journey talking on the phone, usually in a foreign language.

This could easily distract them and cause a crash.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. It is already illegal to talk on your mobile phone while driving.
